The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Tuesday 

Cream Green Pea Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (green pea, white onion, celery, potato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Cauliflower on oven with Millet & Veggies – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (cauliflower, millet, green onoin, green onion, spinach, inactice yeast, tomato, red bell pepper, cashew, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Corn & Red Bell Pepper Crackers Bread- raw / gluten free / 40 g (corn, red bell pepper, quinoa, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chocolate, Vanilla and Caramel Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (peanuts, cocoa butter, alkaline cocoa, guarana, mesquite, cashews, almonds, orange, vanilla, coconut flakes, unfiltered honey)
